# PNPtv Bot - Comprehensive Web Application Sitemap

## Executive Summary
This document provides a complete inventory of all web apps, pages, API endpoints, and nginx configurations served by the PNPtv Bot production environment.

**Domains Served:**
- `pnptv.app` - Main PNPtv application
- `easybots.store` - Payment processing and bot service
- `easybots.site` - Additional payment webhook handlers

**Core Infrastructure:**
- Express.js API Server: Port 3001
- Next.js Application \(easybots.store\): Port 3010
- Nginx Reverse Proxy: Handles routing, SSL termination

---

## 1. NGINX CONFIGURATIONS

### pnptv.app \(Main Domain\)
**File:** `/etc/nginx/sites-available/pnptv.app`

**HTTP/HTTPS Configuration:**
- HTTP \(port 80\): Redirects to HTTPS

## 15. SECURITY & BLOCKING

### Domain-Based Content Blocking

**For easybots.store domain:**
- ✅ Allowed: `/api/*`, `/webhook/*`, `/payment/*`, `/daimo-checkout/*`, `/checkout/*`, `/health`
- ❌ Blocked: Static HTML files, asset files \(.css, .js, .jpg, .png, etc.\)
- ❌ Blocked: Protected routes \(`/videorama`, `/hangouts`, `/live`, `/pnplive`\)

**For easybots.site domain:**
- ✅ Allowed: Payment webhooks and APIs only
- ❌ Blocked: Everything else \(returns 404\)

### Protected Routes \(Auth Required\)

Routes that require Telegram login:
- `/videorama` - Videorama app
- `/hangouts` - Hangouts app  
- `/live` - Live streaming
- `/pnplive` - PNP Live portal

## 18. API REQUEST EXAMPLES

### Get Payment Info
```
GET /api/payment/PAY-ABC123
Response: { success, payment: { paymentId, amount, provider, ... } }
```

### Process Tokenized Charge
```
POST /api/payment/tokenized-charge
Body: { paymentId, cardNumber, expYear, expMonth, cvc, name, email, ... }
```

### Get Radio Now Playing
```
GET /api/radio/now-playing
Response: { track: { title, artist, thumbnailUrl }, listenerCount }
```

### List Media Library
```
GET /api/media/library?type=all&category=music&limit=50
Response: { success, data: [...], count }
```

### Create Playlist
```
POST /api/playlists
Body: { name, description, isPublic }
```

### Join Hangout Call
```
POST /api/hangouts/join/CALL_ID
Response: { success, callInfo, ... }
```
